title: Looking for support/top/adc for ranked 5's
body:
We're a bunch of scrubs looking to make it up the ladder. Making a new team with a fresh beginning, times we usually play around is 7PM pst - 1AM PST.  We're looking for someone from silver to plat we want someone friendly, light hearted, and focused on the game as well as plays a fair amount.

Add me on League if you are interested IGN: Darlin Curtis {{champion:79}}

replies.body: added you as well - supp main
